title: Do the boards not fully support Safari
body: I'm on Safari when I'm on the boards and post pretty often. But when I check my boards profile it treats me as if haven't posted anything. Would like an answer if possible.

replies.body:
Does the same thing happen when you're using another browser such as Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox? You can try cleaning your browser data to see if it causes any change. We have a guide on how to do it [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)

Let me know if anything changes.
I tried cleaning out safarai's data and I'm making this post using chrome but going into my boards profile only shows me that I haven't posted anything.

I took a look at your profile and It shows that you haven't posted any content, which is abnormal. In order to get this resolved, I recommend [creating a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our specialists can resolve this for you.
Alright well thanks for the assistance.
